prompts.prompt: Create an image of a modern ChatGPT-like user interface, featuring a clean and minimalistic design. The UI should include a prominent chat window on the right side with a conversational thread, displaying both user queries and AI responses. There should be a text input box at the bottom of the chat window for typing new messages. On the left side, include a menu bar with icons for settings, home, and help. Above the chat window, display a header with the ChatGPT logo and a search bar. The overall color scheme should be a blend of soothing blues and whites, symbolizing trust and clarity. The UI should have a contemporary and user-friendly appearance."
